author: Mitch Tonks
method: Fry the tuna steaks for a couple of minutes on each side. Mix the salsa ingredients in a bowl; add a squeeze of lemon and a pinch of crunchy sea salt. Serve.
ingredients: 2 tuna steaks,  1 garlic clove, pasted,  1 red pepper, roasted, peeled and diced,  2 leaves radicchio, shredded,  handful basil, chopped,  handful mint, chopped,  1 tsp capers,  1 small chilli, seeded and finely chopped,  2 anchovy fillets, roughly chopped,  1 tomato, seeded and chopped into small dice,  1 lemon, juice only ,  pinch sea salt
